channel.title: Barb assault points saving

item.title: Barb assault points saving
item.dc:creator: @Mod_CubSmiles Mod_CubSmiles
item.description:
@Mod_CubSmiles wrote:

ok i added these things and they still wont save when i log

else if (token.equals("character-Assaultkill")) { Assaultkills = Integer.parseInt(token2); }

under

    public int loadmoreinfo() {

and added this

characterfile.write("character-Assaultkill = ", 0, 22); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(Assaultkills), 0, Integer.toString(Assaultkills).length()); characterfile.newLine();

under

    public boolean savemoreinfo() {

can anyone give me a better method that saves when you log?

Read full topic
